skills.name: REAVE
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance to Steal Power from enemy.

skills.name: CRUMBLE
desc: • Heal all allies based on their MISSING HP. Increase healing by 5% of MAX HP for each Physical Burn, Magic Burn, and Flame effect on each enemy.
• Reduce Enemy Fury by 30% if their Fury is not maxed.
• Gain Power based on Fury reduced.
